item.description:
Have you been wanting to try Ballroom dancing..... or maybe Zumba or Hip Hop? Join us at The Movement Center's Winter Open House. Spend the afternoon taking as many classes as you want for $8 (mention Social Fun to get this rate).

You'll also be entered into a free drawing to win a class card, a gift certificate, and more, and you'll receive exclusive discounts for future classes.
 
Class Schedule
1-1:45pm ~ Swing Dance
1-1:45pm ~ Hip Hop
1:45-2:30pm ~ Salsa
2-2:45pm ~ Tap
2-2:45pm ~ Jazz
2:30-3:15pm ~ Tango
3-3:45pm ~ Ballet
3:15-4pm ~ Zumba

www.the-movement-center.net

Address

The Movement Center Dance Studio
930 Main Street #110, Route 27, Acton, MA 01720

Phone: 978-264-4585
Email: movementctr@hotmail.com

Directions

The Movement Center is located on Route 27/Main Street in Acton.

When you arrive please follow the drive to the right, around to the back of the main building.

From Route 2 West: Follow Route 2 West until you enter roundabout in Concord and take the 2nd exit onto RT-119 W/RT-2A W. Turn SLIGHT RIGHT onto MAIN ST/RT-27. We are located about 1 mile past NARA Park, on the left hand side. We are in the plaza right after Acton Mini Storage, across from North Street.

From Route 2 East: Take the RT-27 N exit, EXIT 42, toward ACTON. Turn LEFT onto RT-27/MAIN ST. Follow for 4 miles. We are located about 1 mile past NARA Park, on the left hand side. We are in the plaza right after Acton Mini Storage, across from North Street.

From Route 27: The Movement Center is located on Route 27. From Acton: We are located about 1 mile past NARA Park, on the left hand side. We are in the plaza right after Acton Mini Storage, across from North Street. From Westford/Carlisle: We are located on the right hand side, across from North Street, we are right before Acton Mini Storage.

From 495 South: Take the BOSTON RD exit, EXIT 32, toward WESTFORD. Turn SLIGHT LEFT to take the ramp toward RT-225. Turn LEFT onto BOSTON RD. BOSTON RD becomes CARLISLE RD. Turn LEFT onto CARLISLE RD/RT-225. Turn RIGHT onto ACTON RD/RT-27. Continue to follow RT-27, for a little less than a mile. We are located on the right hand side, across from North Street, we are right before Acton Mini Storage.

From 495 North: Take the BOSTON RD exit, EXIT 32, toward WESTFORD. Take the ramp toward RT-110/RT-225. Turn SLIGHT RIGHT onto BOSTON RD. Turn SLIGHT RIGHT onto BOSTON RD. BOSTON RD becomes CARLISLE RD. Turn LEFT onto CARLISLE RD/RT-225. Turn RIGHT onto ACTON RD/RT-27. Continue to follow RT-27, for a little less than a mile. We are located on the right hand side, across from North Street, we are right before Acton Mini Storage.
item.how_to_find_us: There will be no formal host. Jen, a Social Fun member, is running this event at her dance studio. See Jen when you arrive.
item.name: Sunday of Dance Classes in Acton - Jan 13
